org.gridgain.grid.spi.cloud
Class GridCloudSpiResourceAdapter

java.lang.Object
  org.gridgain.grid.lang.GridMetadataAwareAdapter
      org.gridgain.grid.spi.cloud.GridCloudSpiResourceAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, Comparable<GridCloudResource>, GridCloudResource, GridMetadataAware
public class GridCloudSpiResourceAdapter
extends GridMetadataAwareAdapter
implements GridCloudResource

Convenient implementation for GridCloudResource supporting metadata. This class is intended for use by SPI implementations.

Method Detail

id

public String id()
Gets ID of this resource. This is vendor specific value that is provided by the cloud provider.

Specified by:
id in interface GridCloudResource
Returns:
Resource ID.

cloudId

public String cloudId()
Gets ID of the cloud this resource belongs to.

Specified by:
cloudId in interface GridCloudResource
Returns:
Cloud ID.

type

public int type()
Gets type of the resource.

Resource types are defined in GridCloudResourceType class. They are specifically constants and not enumerations to allow for user-defined type of resources.

Specified by:
type in interface GridCloudResource
Returns:
Resource type.
See Also:
GridCloudResourceType

links

@Nullable
public Collection<GridCloudResource> links()
Gets collection of resources adjacent to this resource.

Specified by:
links in interface GridCloudResource
Returns:
Collection of adjacent resources. May return null if there are no adjacent resources for this resource.

setLinks

public void setLinks(Collection<GridCloudResource> links)
Sets resource links.

Parameters:
links - Resource links.

parameters

@Nullable
public Map<String,String> parameters()
Gets map of parameters that cloud provides associates with this resource. Depending on cloud SPI implementation this map can change from call to call as it can be re-acquired on each change in the cloud topology. Consult cloud SPI implementation for more details.

Specified by:
parameters in interface GridCloudResource
Returns:
Map of parameters associated with this resource. This map can be changing from call to call depending on specific cloud SPI implementation.

setParameters

public void setParameters(Map<String,String> params)
Sets resource parameters.

Parameters:
params - Resource parameters.
